TEXT.English: The Power of the American Dream:
TEXT.Chinese: The Power of the American Dream:

TEXT.English: Additional happiness from running Republic, Capitalism and Free Market
TEXT.Chinese: Additional happiness from running Republic, Capitalism and Free Market

TEXT.English: State religion spreads with temples to conquered cities
TEXT.Chinese: State religion spreads with temples to conquered cities

TEXT.English: Great Generals can start Golden Ages
TEXT.Chinese: Great Generals can start Golden Ages

TEXT.English: Military units can enslave defeated enemy units, can sacrifice slaves to increase city happiness
TEXT.Chinese: Military units can enslave defeated enemy units, can sacrifice slaves to increase city happiness

TEXT.English: The Power of the Cradle of Civilization:
TEXT.Chinese: The Power of the Cradle of Civilization:

TEXT.English: Receives a free technology for the first four technologies discovered
TEXT.Chinese: Receives a free technology for the first four technologies discovered

TEXT.English: Sugar counts as oil for Oil Industry
TEXT.Chinese: Sugar counts as oil for Oil Industry

TEXT.English: Double gold value in trades, spies can bribe barbarian units
TEXT.Chinese: Double gold value in trades, spies can bribe barbarian units

TEXT.English: [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Bribe Barbarians[COLOR_REVERT][NEWLINE]Allows your spy to offer gold to bribe one barbarian unit on this plot to join your army.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Bribe Barbarians[COLOR_REVERT][NEWLINE]Allows your spy to offer gold to bribe one barbarian unit on this plot to join your army.

TEXT.English: Choose the barbarian unit you wish to bribe:
TEXT.Chinese: Choose the barbarian unit you wish to bribe:

TEXT.English: Immigrants coming to our city of %s1 have brought it %d3 points closer to generating a %s2.
TEXT.Chinese: Immigrants coming to our city of %s1 have brought it %d3 points closer to generating a %s2.

TEXT.English: Halved costs and no extra upkeep for hurried units
TEXT.Chinese: Halved costs and no extra upkeep for hurried units

TEXT.English: Faster research of techologies that nobody has discovered yet until the Renaissance
TEXT.Chinese: Faster research of techologies that nobody has discovered yet until the Renaissance

TEXT.English: No City Resistance on Conquest in Latin America
TEXT.Chinese: No City Resistance on Conquest in Latin America

TEXT.English: %s1 has fielded an army to conquer our civilization!
TEXT.Chinese: %s1 has fielded an army to conquer our civilization!

TEXT.English: Monarchy, Redistribution and Deification are enabled at start
TEXT.Chinese: Monarchy, Redistribution and Deification are enabled at start

TEXT.English: Faraway Cities incur no extra Maintenance
TEXT.Chinese: Faraway Cities incur no extra Maintenance

TEXT.English: Land units receive +10% additional strength within cultural borders
TEXT.Chinese: Land units receive +10% additional strength within cultural borders

TEXT.English: Diplomatic penalties expire faster, more likely to be voted for in congresses
TEXT.Chinese: Diplomatic penalties expire faster, more likely to be voted for in congresses

TEXT.English: Units retain all their experience when upgraded
TEXT.Chinese: Units retain all their experience when upgraded

TEXT.English: +150% Great People birth rate until the end of the Classical Era
TEXT.Chinese: +150% Great People birth rate until the end of the Classical Era

TEXT.English: Positive health contributes to city growth during the Ancient era
TEXT.Chinese: Positive health contributes to city growth during the Ancient era

TEXT.English: Doubled yield and commerce from the trading company corporation
TEXT.Chinese: Doubled yield and commerce from the trading company corporation

TEXT.English: Double construction speed of state religion buildings
TEXT.Chinese: Double construction speed of state religion buildings

TEXT.English: One extra [ICON_HEALTHY] for every three excess [ICON_HAPPY]
TEXT.Chinese: One extra [ICON_HEALTHY] for every three excess [ICON_HAPPY]

TEXT.English: Additional gold from foreign ships passing through your core
TEXT.Chinese: Additional gold from foreign ships passing through your core

TEXT.English: Free specialist in all of your cities until the Industrial Age
TEXT.Chinese: Free specialist in all of your cities until the Industrial Age

TEXT.English: After discovering all medieval techs, every tech three other civilizations are willing to trade costs -50% [ICON_RESEARCH]
TEXT.Chinese: After discovering all medieval techs, every tech three other civilizations are willing to trade costs -50% [ICON_RESEARCH]

TEXT.English: All land units can move through jungles and rainforests, can build farms on rainforest
TEXT.Chinese: All land units can move through jungles and rainforests, can build farms on rainforest

TEXT.English: Jungles, rainforests and marshes yield extra food and production and cause no unhealthiness
TEXT.Chinese: Jungles, rainforests and marshes yield extra food and production and cause no unhealthiness

TEXT.English: Free Drill I and Drill II promotions for all naval units
TEXT.Chinese: Free Drill I and Drill II promotions for all naval units

TEXT.English: -40% research cost until beginning of the Middle Ages
TEXT.Chinese: -40% research cost until beginning of the Middle Ages

TEXT.English: Cities threatened by your armies descend into unrest
TEXT.Chinese: Cities threatened by your armies descend into unrest

TEXT.Chinese: The citizens of %s1 tremble in fear before our approaching armies!

TEXT.Chinese: Frightened by the approaching Mongol armies, the citizens of %s1 have abandoned their defenses!

TEXT.English: Improvements that yield food give one extra food on plains tiles until the Renaissance
TEXT.Chinese: Improvements that yield food give one extra food on plains tiles until the Renaissance

TEXT.English: Cities receive half the construction cost as culture after a building is completed
TEXT.Chinese: Cities receive half the construction cost as culture after a building is completed

TEXT.English: No stability penalties for controlling cities with foreign culture
TEXT.Chinese: No stability penalties for controlling cities with foreign culture

TEXT.English: No penalties for cultural expansion over Ocean tiles
TEXT.Chinese: No penalties for cultural expansion over Ocean tiles

TEXT.English: Additional food and commerce during Golden Ages
TEXT.Chinese: Additional food and commerce during Golden Ages

TEXT.English: Ocean Trade allowed with Cartography, reduced instability for overseas colonies
TEXT.Chinese: Ocean Trade allowed with Cartography, reduced instability for overseas colonies

TEXT.English: Buildings that already exist in your capital receive +30% construction speed.
TEXT.Chinese: Buildings that already exist in your capital receive +30% construction speed.
